data.title: Memos to Agency Records Officers (AC Memos)
data.meta_description: NARA Memos to Agency Records Officers (AC Memos) are general announcements issued via email by the Office of the Chief Records Officer for the United States Government. data.text:
NARA Memos to Agency Records Officers (AC Memos) are general announcements issued via email by the Office of the Chief Records Officer for the United States Government. The content of these memos varies but typically includes information about federal records management policies, guidance, training opportunities, and meetings. Some of the memos are transitory and have limited applicability.

All AC Memos are provided here for reference purposes only; they do not necessarily represent the current NARA records management policy.

Subscribe to Federal Records Management Emails

Past Memos (FY 2012-FY 2022)

Bulletins

Memos to Agency Records Officers Fiscal Year 2024
